description: VAPT Interface Schema v2.0 — UI component definitions for all 125 risks. platform_implementations.code_ref points to enforcer_pattern_library_v2.0 using consistent lib_key names. driver_ref points to vapt_driver_manifest_v2.0.

RISK-001.title: wp-cron.php Enabled Leads to DoS Attack
RISK-001.summary: WordPress cron system enabled via wp-cron.php allows resource exhaustion through repeated cron spam requests, leading to server overload.

components.label: Enable protection for wp-cron.php Enabled Leads to DoS Attack

wp-config.php.insertion_rule: Must be placed BEFORE: require_once ABSPATH . 'wp-settings.php';

RISK-002.title: Xmlrpc enabled Leads to Ping back attack
RISK-002.summary: XML-RPC enabled allows distributed pingback amplification attacks, enabling DDoS via pingback.ping method.

components.label: Enable protection for Xmlrpc enabled Leads to Ping back attack

.htaccess.note: Apache 2.4+: use Require all denied

RISK-003.title: Username Enumeration via WordPress REST API
RISK-003.summary: WP REST API /wp/v2/users endpoint exposes usernames without authentication.

components.label: Enable protection for Username Enumeration via WordPress REST API

.htaccess.note: Must be BEFORE # BEGIN WordPress. WP [L] catch-all makes anything after # END WordPress a dead zone. Covers /users and /users/ variants.

RISK-004.title: Email Flooding via Password Reset
RISK-004.summary: wp-login.php?checkemail=1 endpoint abuse allows unlimited password reset emails.

components.label: Enable protection for Email Flooding via Password Reset

RISK-005.title: Exposed WordPress Admin Username via Author Query
RISK-005.summary: /?author=1 reveals admin usernames through IDOR in author archives.

components.label: Enable protection for Exposed WordPress Admin Username via Author Query

.htaccess.note: Must be BEFORE # BEGIN WordPress. Regex (^|&)author=\d+ matches all numeric IDs and any query param position.

RISK-006.title: Endpoint Disclosure (auto-generated WP REST routes)
RISK-006.summary: WordPress auto-generates REST API routes exposing internal endpoints without permission checks.

components.label: Enable protection for Endpoint Disclosure (auto-generated WP REST routes)

RISK-007.title: Lack of Rate Limiting on WordPress Login
RISK-007.summary: wp-login.php lacks brute-force protection, enabling unlimited login attempts.

components.label: Enable protection for Lack of Rate Limiting on WordPress Login

RISK-008.title: Username Enumeration via wp-login.php
RISK-008.summary: Different error messages on wp-login.php reveal valid vs invalid usernames.

components.label: Enable protection for Username Enumeration via wp-login.php

RISK-009.title: Lack of Rate Limiting on Contact and Registration Forms
RISK-009.summary: Contact/registration forms allow spam/DoS without submission limits.

components.label: Enable protection for Lack of Rate Limiting on Contact and Registration Forms

RISK-010.title: Server Banner Grabbing
RISK-010.summary: Server headers expose Apache/Nginx versions for targeted exploits.

components.label: Enable protection for Server Banner Grabbing

RISK-011.title: Information Disclosure via readme.html
RISK-011.summary: Root readme.html exposes exact WordPress version to attackers. New

components.label: Enable protection for Information Disclosure via readme.html

.htaccess.note: Apache 2.4+: use Require all denied

RISK-012.title: HSTS Not Implemented
RISK-012.summary: Missing HSTS header enables HTTPS downgrade and MITM attacks.

components.label: Enable protection for HSTS Not Implemented

.htaccess.note: Enable mod_headers: sudo a2enmod headers. Effective over HTTPS only.

RISK-013.title: Directory Listing Enabled
RISK-013.summary: Apache directory listing exposes file structure to attackers.

components.label: Enable protection for Directory Listing Enabled

.htaccess.note: Requires AllowOverride Options or All. Silently fails without it.

RISK-014.title: Missing X-Frame-Options Header
RISK-014.summary: Clickjacking vulnerability due to missing X-Frame-Options header.

components.label: Enable protection for Missing X-Frame-Options Header

RISK-015.title: Missing X-Content-Type-Options Header
RISK-015.summary: MIME sniffing vulnerability allows content type manipulation.

components.label: Enable protection for Missing X-Content-Type-Options Header
Enable protection for Missing X-XSS-Protection Header

RISK-017.title: Missing Referrer-Policy Header
RISK-017.summary: Referrer information leaked to third parties.

components.label: Enable protection for Missing Referrer-Policy Header
Enable protection for Missing Permissions-Policy Header
Enable protection for Sensitive Files Accessible

.htaccess.note: Apache 2.4+: use Require all denied

RISK-020.title: PHP File Execution in Uploads Directory
RISK-020.summary: PHP files can execute in uploads folder.

components.label: Enable protection for PHP File Execution in Uploads Directory

.htaccess.note: CRITICAL: Place in wp-content/uploads/.htaccess — a separate file. <Directory> is silently ignored in .htaccess. Apache 2.4+: use Require all denied

components.label: Enable protection for WordPress Config File Accessible

.htaccess.note: Apache 2.4+: use Require all denied

RISK-022.title: Missing Content-Security-Policy Header
RISK-022.summary: XSS and data injection attacks possible.

components.label: Enable protection for Missing Content-Security-Policy Header

.htaccess.note: Tune to your plugin/theme needs. Use Content-Security-Policy-Report-Only first.

RISK-023.title: Trace Method Enabled
RISK-023.summary: HTTP TRACE method allows XSS attacks.

components.label: Enable protection for Trace Method Enabled

.htaccess.note: TraceEnable off is server-level only (silently ignored in .htaccess). Also add: TraceEnable off to httpd.conf.

RISK-024.title: Server Signature Enabled
RISK-024.summary: Server version exposed in error pages.

components.label: Enable protection for Server Signature Enabled

.htaccess.note: ServerSignature Off is server-level only (silently ignored in .htaccess). Also add: ServerSignature Off + ServerTokens Prod to httpd.conf.

components.label: Enable protection for ETags Information Leakage

.htaccess.note: Requires AllowOverride Options or All.

components.label: Enable protection for Symbolic Links Following Enabled

.htaccess.note: SymLinksIfOwnerMatch allows same-owner symlinks as a safer alternative.

components.label: Enable protection for WordPress Install File Accessible

.htaccess.note: Apache 2.4+: use Require all denied

components.label: Enable protection for WordPress Upgrade File Accessible

.htaccess.note: Apache 2.4+: use Require all denied

components.label: Enable protection for Backup Files Accessible

.htaccess.note: Apache 2.4+: use Require all denied

components.label: Enable protection for Log Files Accessible

.htaccess.note: Apache 2.4+: use Require all denied

components.label: Enable protection for Missing Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy
Enable protection for Missing Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy

.htaccess.note: May break third-party embeds. Test with COEP: Report-Only first.

components.label: Enable protection for Missing Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy
Enable protection for WordPress Debug Log Exposed

.htaccess.note: Apache 2.4+: use Require all denied

components.label: Enable protection for Apache Status Page Accessible

.htaccess.note: Preferred: restrict in httpd.conf with <Location /server-status> Require local </Location>

components.label: Enable protection for PHP Error Display Enabled
Enable protection for PHP Version Exposed in Headers

RISK-038.title: WordPress Version Exposed
RISK-038.summary: WordPress version in meta generator tag.

components.label: Enable protection for WordPress Version Exposed

RISK-039.title: Plugin Version Exposed
RISK-039.summary: Plugin versions exposed in source code.

components.label: Enable protection for Plugin Version Exposed
Enable protection for WordPress Login Page Not Protected
Enable protection for Weak Password Policy
Enable protection for Session Timeout Not Configured
Enable protection for No Account Lockout Policy

RISK-044.title: User Registration Without Verification
RISK-044.summary: Anyone can register without email verification.

components.label: Enable protection for User Registration Without Verification
Enable protection for Default Admin Account Exists
Enable protection for No Two-Factor Authentication
Enable protection for File Upload Without Validation

RISK-048.title: SQL Injection via Search
RISK-048.summary: Search parameter vulnerable to SQL injection.

components.label: Enable protection for SQL Injection via Search
Enable protection for Cross-Site Scripting in Comments
Enable protection for CSRF Protection Missing
Enable protection for Unfiltered HTML in Posts
Enable protection for Theme Editor Enabled
Enable protection for Plugin Editor Enabled
Enable protection for XML External Entity Processing
